entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
